data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Sermersooq, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sermersooq, Greenland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Sermersooq, Greenland to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sermersooq, Greenland.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Pour your Spirit out on the 23,500 citizens of Sermersooq, Greenland, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sermersooq, Greenland.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Sermersooq will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Sermersooq to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Sermersooq to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sermersooq, Greenland has a population of 23,500.

We estimate Sermersooq has 1,791 people who might know Jesus, 20,605 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,103 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.
